nodes.text: Exodo II was a hot, stormy, and dense world in the Meridian sector, near Durren and Odos. The Millennium Falcon had a brief encounter with the world nine years after the Battle of Endor.

In the early months of the Yuuzhan Vong invasion the Vong priestess Elan was captured by a New Republic task force present in the system. Later during the Yuuzhan Vong War, the Imperial Remnant attempted to protect the world, before it fell to the invaders.
In 44 ABY, the Vongformed world was the site of a battle between the Imperial Remnant and the Maw Irregular Fleet.
